# Akari Slack Theme

Slack themes inspired by Japanese alleys lit by round lanterns.

## Installation

1. Open Slack and go to **Preferences** (Cmd/Ctrl + ,)
2. Navigate to **Themes** > **Custom Theme**
3. Click **Import** and paste the theme string from the file below

### Night

> [!TIP]
> Set Slack's color theme to **Dark** for the best experience.

Copy the contents of [akari-night.txt](./akari-night.txt)

### Dawn

> [!TIP]
> Set Slack's color theme to **Light** for the best experience.

Copy the contents of [akari-dawn.txt](./akari-dawn.txt)

## Recommended Settings

Enable **Window gradient** for a smoother appearance that blends the background with selected items.

## Variants

- **akari-night** - Dark theme with lantern-lit atmosphere
- **akari-dawn** - Light theme with morning warmth
